meanings.definition: A unit of weight equal to 100 pounds.
meanings.sent1: The farmer measured the grain in centals.
meanings.sent2: She bought flour in centals for the bakery.
meanings.sent3: The centals of apples were so heavy, they made the scale tip!
meanings.sent4: His love for her weighed more than a thousand centals.
meanings.sent5: The centals of books in the library seemed to stretch on forever.

meanings.definition: A unit of volume equal to 100 US gallons.
meanings.sent1: The truck carried centals of water for the dry village.
meanings.sent2: They needed centals of paint to cover the entire wall.
meanings.sent3: The centals of lemonade at the party disappeared quickly.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like centals of joy.
meanings.sent5: The centals of tears shed during the sad movie were heart-wrenching.

meanings.sent3: The centals of candy in the jar tempted the children.
meanings.sent4: His determination weighed more than a thousand centals.
